solution_line_template: In an hour, Emily can type {words_per_minute} words *{minutes_per_hour} minutes = <<{words_per_minute}*{minutes_per_hour}={words_per_hour}>>{words_per_hour} words.
It will take her {total_words}/{words_per_hour} = <<{total_words}/{words_per_hour}={time_in_hours}>>{time_in_hours} hours to write {total_words} words.
